title: NBC Olympic Logo Typeface
content:
What is the typeface used here?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122105256im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/olympics1_4096.gif)

 [‹ Signage typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122105256/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48389 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sniptools bold sans-serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122105256/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48392 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lathen.kamas

comments.content: ‘BEIJING’ looks like [ITC Newtext](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122105256/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_newtext_std_virtual/) with modified J and G, and ‘2008’ looks like [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122105256/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/squooshed) [Albertus](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122105256/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/albertus_by_adobe_roman/).
